title.narrative: Flexible Facility for Business Environment Reform

description.narrative: This activity (Flexible Facility for Business Environment Reform) is a component of Private Sector Development programme in the Democratic Republic of Congo reported by FCDO, with a funding type of 'Procurement of Services' and a budget of £29,423,426. This component benefits Congo (Democratic Republic), and works in the following sector(s): Formal sector financial intermediaries, Small and medium-sized enterprises (SME) development, Business Policy and Administration. , with the following implementing partners: International Food Policy Research Institute, PwC. The start date is 10-01-2013 and the end date is 31-03-2022.

owner-org.narrative: UK - Foreign, Commonwealth and Development Office (FCDO)
